Here we simulate stock prices then plot ACF


```{r}
library(tidyverse)

# MA_mean = 2
# MA_weight = 0.5

MA <- arima.sim(model=list(order = c(0,0,1), ma = 0.5), n = 200, mean = 2)
plot(MA)

```
